aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tushit a kaimin tu, “mihumisang masnanava.”

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa isnavaanin hai, isnavaan a kaimin mas malisBunun tu issisipul.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: uhansiapan a saikin mas supah ituBunun tu halinga.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: kaupahanian a saikin kusian mas pasnanavaan.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: kaupahanian a saikin mapasnava mas malisBunun.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: napata’azaunku a inaak cina.
and I want to tell my mother.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: inaak ngaan hai Alang.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: inaak tu tama ngaan hai Biung.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: inaak tu cina ngaan hai Savi.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: punmas’an tu haminsan a saikin.

我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: muskun kaimin isian tasa tu pasnanavaan isnavaan.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mazima saikin siin inaak tu tuhasnanaz kahuzas.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mazima saikin sunghaul, mais islunghu hai, muskun a kaimin tastulumah kudiip sunghaul.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: malauskav a inaak tama, saia hai kisacu.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: matukulaaz a inaak cina, saia hai ising.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: palisBununun a kaimin mas inaak tu tama mais ilumah.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa hanianin, cindanghas a dihanin.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masingav saikin mas cina tu: mavia tu sambaiv a dihaninan i?

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: antalam a cina tu, “adu nabalivusanin.”

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: usaduanik mas supah tu hazam, isian a naia mas lukiscia kusbabai, usaduanangik mas ithuu tu isian haitungavlukis masabah.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: aiza a sisipzuh, luba siin uknav isian patciciancia, nii’ang saikin sinadu mas naitaan tu cici manaskal i mahtu hanian usaduan.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa sanavanin, taskunim kusian hici maun mas pinitsanavan.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: musuhisin a kaimin kusian Taihuku, nitu haiap tu adu’ingkaduanin a itupantamaun utubai.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: taikisianik sian Nansalu masa uvaazang haitu isnavaanin sian kuminkaku hai tausian Taihuku, katsianin hici minghumis.
When we were young, our family lived in Nansalu . After I started school, we moved to Taipei and have been living in the city ever since.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: isnavaanin sian daikaku, mapasnava’ik mas pali’Incumin tu ispaspasnava, uhaiapan mas ituTai’uan Incumin vaivivaivi tu sinpalihumis.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: paha, aip tu lunghulabal hai, taskunik mas tuhasnanaz kusian mai’asang masingav mas madadaingaz, cis’uni tu na’asa uhaiapan mas itu’anak’anak tu sinpalihumis.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: pun80in tu hamisan a madaingaza, haitu maszangang mas tailutbu mais saduan.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masingavangik saicia tu mamaaz a halinga hansiapunsu? madauzung a isaicia malisBunun, mahansiap amin malisTa’ialu, malisNGaingai siin malisLipun.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Bunun, as well as Atayal, Hakka and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的布農族語說得很流利，也會說泰雅語、客家話和日本話。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tudiipinik haiap tu maipasnava hangsia a saia mas malisLipun masa uvaazang, musasu Ta’ialu a isaicia pingaz musasu cis’uni kuzakuza at mapasahaal mas supah tu NGaingai, paha haiap supah tu halinga.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Atayal, and he knows many Hakkas at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是泰雅族人，而他工作上認識許多客家人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa masingav a kaimin hai, tahu a madaingaza mas supah palihanup tu taiklas.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: haalim nitu maplaz tu ithaal, haitu maku’uni kaimin mas takutaa macihaningu, namahtu aipcinin itmantukun.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa uvaazangik hai, nitu haiap mas itu’anak’anak tu sinpalihumis, paha maz’avmaz’av mais tupa tu Incumin saikin
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mais supahin haiapun hai, makanadidiip usaduan tu min’uni mas Bunun hai makitvaivi, mahtu iskuniv.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Bunun is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為布農族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: nakulumah a naubananaz mais mansanavanin.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: taskunik mas cinahudas kusian babalivan mabaliv mas tulkuk, na’anatun mais sanavanin i na’ispakaun mas naubananaz.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: anhaibim sian tatansunsanglav, supah a babahlu sanglav.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mabalivim mas takunkun, utanbauna siin tauplasdanghas.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: malala a mandainglan tatansun mas kanakaununa tu, “madavus a inaak bunglai siin halupan. mahtu mabaliv tu kauman ha!”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mabalivim mas bunglai siin halup.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: anhaibim sian tatansun mas maicici, tupa a laupaan tu: namaaz balivunsu? masmuhdaingaz a aip tulkuk, kaaz tasa ka 300 tu sui.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: sa’aklis a cinahudas at masingav tu adumahtu iasui’unang tu kauman.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: haitu antalam a laupaan tu: iasuidaingazin hai, nii’in tu mahtu pisvanahun.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: malala a mansisila laupaan tu, “mabaliva inaak tu iskaan, madaing at iasui a inaak iskaan.”
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: kinuzin, mabalivim mas tulkuk siin iskaan, kulumah ma’anat mas tastupangkaka tu pandian.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: malbuntuin mastatala, dungzavin isdumdum.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: patunding’ua a naubananaz tu: tusha a kuaping tu nitu mahtu islunghu, nasinlunghuin tu niciu mahtu kulumah.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tupa a cinahudas tu, “supah a sin’anatan at tan’alia mas bunun tu minsumaa kuskun.”
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 因為奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tan’ali’im mas tas’aan siin tunali, kuskun mas vaivivaivi tu pinitsanavan.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: aizaanik tasa aluszangan tupaun tu Dahu, mazima lalaktan.
I have a classmate named Dahu, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Dahu，他常常忘記帶東西。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mais isnavaan hai, simul sian aluszangan mas ispapatas, ishahaishais siin ahil.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mus’an, mupus’an, muciun, mapasimulang amin aluszangan mas saicia.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: haitu, dangian a saia mas makuang tu kainaaman, mais sinimul hai nitu masuhis.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: kinuzin, nii’in amin asa mapasimul mas saicia.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: aiza tu hanian, kudiipim mapahainan.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: isianang daan, cin’asa a Dahua muunata, haitu nitu minadas mas ahilkuskus.
On the way, Dahu wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Dahu想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: nasimul a saia sian aluszangan mas ahilkuskus, haitu tupa amin tu: nii’ik amin minadas.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: kaivakaiva a Dahua at tangis, malsupnuh tupa tu, “mavia kamu tu nitu mapasimulku mas ahilkuskus i!”
Dahu burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Dahu急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tahuan a saia mas aluszangan tu: atanau i niias kanak’anak maadas, musasu mais pasimulanas hai, nitu namasuhis.”
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa kutunin tu isnavaan, macinsanus a Dahua kusian pasnanavaan, sizaun mas dahucia a sinsisimul masuhis sian aluszangan.
The next day at school, Dahu arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Dahu很早就到學校了，Dahu把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masi’aupa a Dahu sian aluszangan pisssuhdung, at tupa tu: nakanak’anakik maisinin maadas mas iskukusia, uninang mas aluszangan i maipasisimulku mas haimangsut.
Dahu apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Dahu向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: inaak tama hai hahanup.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa uvaazangik, kunata a tama siin pantamaun mais sanavan, maadas mas singhaili siin busul.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mais istus’a’in hai, maadas a naia mas hinanup tu cici minsuma.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: minsaan mais vanis, minsaan mais aval, duanduan aiza cikulas.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: pavazun naicia a cici, is’siahtu sian taisis’aan.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會將獵物分好，分享給族人。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: kaupakaupa’ik uningai mas tama tu namalavi mas tama kudiip hanup.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tupa a tama tu, na’adasunik. mais taldaingin.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mahansiap amin a taikisian asang mabananaz maku’ahu madamu mas cici, mahansiap a naia ka’uni mas ahuduun siin hatup.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mahansiap a inaak tama ka’uni mas ahuduun tupa a tama tu, is’a’ahu a sain mas cikulas, asa kata tu samantuk mas itucici tu kaindapanan, asa a ispalasung tu pusianun nalahaiban mas naicia.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: cis’uni tu na’asa ma’aipi taskun mas madadaingaz hanup, paha kaupahanian a saikin tatanam malka’ahu, zaav a inaak sinpal’ahu cisduan mas cici.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa ishaiapan a tama hai, tupaku tu, namin’unias mas talhanupan.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: aip, taldainginik, cis’ama’ik mas inaak tu busulkavi siin hatnga, malavi mas tama kudiip hanup.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa taunasianin asang hai, is’siahtu zami a hinanupan sian taisis’aan.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tupa a tama tu, asata tu matumashing mas Dihanin tu sintauhumis, masaiv mita mas supah tu hinanupan.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: alasan a saikin masa um’um kausian pasnanavaan.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa kausian pasnanavaan hai, sipungul a saikin ma’adas mas kabaang.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: maningzav tu uka a adasunku.
I didn’t bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa isnavaan hai, muskun a saikin mas aluszangan sadu mas ahil.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa sikiing hai, pasimulanik mas aluszangan mas ispapatas siin ishahaishais.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tupaunik mas masnanava tu “macingmuta minkailas mais muhna’in, kakaa’in alasan!”
The teacher told me, “Wake up earlier next time and don’t be late again!”
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tupaun a inaak kaviaz tu Biung, ituBunun amin a saia tu uvaaz.
My good friend’s name is Biung, and he is also an Bunun child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Biung，他也是布農族的小孩。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: muskun a kaimin sian Nansalu isnavaan.
We study together in the Nansalu tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在南沙魯部落讀書。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mabuntu a kaimin muskun ta’aza mas madadaingaz palihabasan, mahansiap amin a kaimin malisBunun.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Bunun proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說布農族語。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: malauskav a saikin aat masmuh, mapucis a Biung aat matukulaaz.
I am tall and overweight, while Biung is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Biung很矮也很瘦。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mahatba a Biung, mazima amin bunun mas saicia.
Biung is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Biung很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: aip hai itupasnanavaan tu pantataip, supah a ispasavai sian pasnanavaan.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: aiza a mapasibutbut, pismalibantas, cisdadaan, pisvakavaka, pisbusulkavi.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: min’amu a saikin mas cisdadaan.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: ciskapat a saikin masa cisdadaan, pishaidang a, malung.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: haitu, minsalangka a saikin, macingna’ang cisdadaan.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa taunasian pas’upaan a saikin hai manaskal amin a bunun.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: haal nii a saikin atalu mas taismitasa, haitu, manaskal a saikin, aupa saukanahtung a saikin mapasavai.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: taskunik masa takna mas tama, tantungu sian pantamaun.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Haisul.Palavian。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mapatuzikaangin a saikin mas saicia tu nakausian isaicia tu lumah masingav mas saicia.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masa masisingav hai papasahaalunik tu maikusna’isa a isaicia ngaan. papasahaalku amin mas isaicia tu tastulumah. isaicia tu asang.

我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tupaunku a saia tu: mavia a kasu tu na’asa matsuhis nganbubun i? masial aupa a tatuuna ispatutuki hai?

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tupaunik mas saicia tu aupa nii a patasantauluu’an mahtu mathas tu mapishaiap mas isaicia tu ngaan. aiza a bunun malala mas saicia tu Hai tais’aan, aat min’uni mas iskangingiit.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: tupa a Haisul.Palavian tu: maza maku’uni mas malis’Imcumin mapatas tu ngaan hai imita mamantuk tu ngaan. daihiu a inaak ngaanan mas imita tu siduh, imita tu sinpathaal. hadang madia a tais’aan masuhais mas itu’anak’anak tu ngaan.
Noami Kulas said, “The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group, our family, our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.”
我今天七點到學校。: Haisul.Palavi說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: taskunik masa takna mas hudaspingaz kaudiip matansun, ma’adas a hudaspingaz mas supah kai’anak’anakan masuaz tu sanglav, ka’uni’ang amin mas kakaununBunun isaiv mas tais’aan.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: mazima amin a tais’aan mas ituhudaspingaz tatansunancia, madia a bunun mabaliv mas mahav siin cilkung, madia a bunun minsuma maun mas sin’anat saicia tu pandian.

aip tu cinpitu, kusian a saikin pasnanav: masial kaunun a isaicia inanat tu li’li siin pinit’ia tu haising, aiza’ang ku’unian haimis mapitsimal tu maivanis, si’upa mas madia tu dudulap, malsauluk amin sian inaam tatansunantan.
